tool_description: Scans and identifies all hardware components in the system including CPU, RAM, storage devices, graphics cards, and peripheral devices to generate a comprehensive hardware inventory report.

scan_type.description: Type of hardware scan to perform: basic, detailed, or compatibility

include_drivers.description: Whether to include current driver information in the scan

error_messages: Invalid scan type: Use one of [basic, detailed, compatibility].
Hardware access denied: Run with administrator privileges to access all hardware components.
System hardware detection failed: Ensure system is powered on and hardware is properly connected.
usage: Specify scan_type as basic for quick overview, detailed for comprehensive analysis, or compatibility for OS installation planning. Set include_drivers to false if only hardware inventory is needed.

storage_devices.description: List of detected storage devices with capacity and type

graphics_cards.description: List of graphics cards and their specifications
